body_html: Unfortunately I don't think a simple formula for the number of steps is sufficient to cover all cases. The proposed formula does only one epoch, which is usually not what one wants. Since this is a tutorial, I think a hardcoded number of steps is fine.
body_text: Unfortunately I don't think a simple formula for the number of steps is sufficient to cover all cases.  The proposed formula does only one epoch, which is usually not what one wants.  Since this is a tutorial, I think a hardcoded number of steps is fine.
body: Unfortunately I don't think a simple formula for the number of steps is sufficient to cover all cases.  The proposed formula does only one epoch, which is usually not what one wants.  Since this is a tutorial, I think a hardcoded number of steps is fine.
